title: 4-7-8 Breathing Reset
content: Take a moment to reset your nervous system. Inhale for 4 counts, hold for 7, exhale for 8. Repeat 3-4 times. This activates your parasympathetic nervous system and helps reduce cortisol.

title: Neck and Shoulder Release
content: Sitting or standing, slowly roll your shoulders back 5 times, then forward 5 times. Gently tilt your head to each side, holding for 10 seconds. Finish with gentle neck circles.

title: 5-4-3-2-1 Grounding
content: Ground yourself in the present moment. Notice 5 things you can see, 4 things you can touch, 3 things you can hear, 2 things you can smell, and 1 thing you can taste.

title: Desk Energy Boost
content: Stand up and do 10 gentle squats followed by 10 arm circles. Take 3 deep breaths while reaching your arms overhead. Feel the energy flow through your body.

title: Gentle Wind-Down Stretch
content: Prepare your body for rest. Do gentle neck rolls, shoulder shrugs, and seated spinal twists. End by placing your hands on your heart and taking 5 slow, deep breaths.
